t_news_event_audio::clip_card_14::goals[: Record another sound of something happening at the event.
t_news_event_audio::text_card_0::text: This template will help you report on an event in your community. The clips suggested cover the primary shots you will need to tell the story of most events. Feel free to skip shots, or use different shots as needed. Additionally, adapt the suggested questions to suit your needs.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_7::goals[0: Record sound of a place important to the event.
t_news_event_audio::title: Event Audio Report
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_9::goals[0: Tell us some interesting facts about the event or why it happens.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_2::goals[0: Record sound of something introducing the event.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_12::goals[: Record sound of how the event ends.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_4::goals[0: Record sound of what happens at the event.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_16::goals[: Record sound of the result of people interacting at the event.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_11::goals[: Record another sound of something important to the event.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_6::goals[0: Ask an Expert to talk about the event.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_3::goals[0: Ask someone who is part of the event: What happens at the event?
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_8::goals[0: Record sound of people interacting at the event.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_18::goals[: Record sound of the end of the event.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_10::goals[: Ask: Why is this event interesting?
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_13::goals[: Tell us how the event changes as it progresses.

t_news_event_audio::clip_card_1::goals[0: Record sound of preparation for the event.
t_news_event_audio::clip_card_5::goals[0: Record something interesting about the event.
